22      PostureReconstructor, SimpleForwardKinematics

27 -class BodyModelReconstructor(object): 

28      """ 
29      Reconstructs body model movements from individual joint data. 
30   
31      This behaviour combines a L{PostureReconstructor} and 
32      a L{PositionEstimator} to update a L{SampledBodyModel}. 
33   
34      @ivar bodyModel: L{SampledBodyModel} being updated. 
35      """ 
36   

37 -    def __init__(self, bodyModel, initialPosition=np.zeros((3,1)), 
38              postureReconstructor=SimpleForwardKinematics, 
39              positionEstimator=ConstantPosition, initialTime=0): 

40          """ 
41          Initialise behaviour. 
42   
43          @param bodyModel: L{SampledBodyModel} to update. 
44          @param postureReconstructor: L{PostureReconstructor} subclass to use. 
45          @param positionEstimator: L{PositionEstimator} subclass to use. 
46          @param initialTime: Initial time. 
47          """ 
48          self.bodyModel = bodyModel 
49          self._postureEstimator = postureReconstructor(self.bodyModel) 
50          self._positionEstimator = positionEstimator(self.bodyModel, 
51                  initialPosition = initialPosition) 
52          self._time = initialTime 

53   

54 -    def handleData(self, data, dt): 

55          """ 
56          Update the body model with new data. 
57   
58          @param data: A L{dict} containing data, passed directly to both the 
59              posture and position estimators. 
60          @param dt: Time elapsed since last call to this method or __init__. 
61          """ 
62          self._time += dt 
63          self._postureEstimator(data, self._time) 
64          self._positionEstimator(data, self._time)
